Sentencas: Chromium (Cr) species vaporizing from chromia-forming alloy interconnects is known as a source of degradation in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks called cathode poisoning.
Titulo: Effect of interconnect coating procedure on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: (Mn,Co)(3)O-4 spinel coatings offer good protection against Cr evaporation during operation.
Titulo: Effect of interconnect coating procedure on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: In this study, Crofer 22 APU steel interconnects were electrophoretically deposited in different mediums to obtain high packing of green coating layer.
Titulo: Effect of interconnect coating procedure on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The optimized sample was then sintered in air-atmosphere or dual-atmospheres (reducing-oxidizing).
Titulo: Effect of interconnect coating procedure on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Anode-supported cells were exposed from cathode side to bare or coated interconnects for 100 h at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Effect of interconnect coating procedure on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The electrochemical performances of aged cells were compared at 800 degrees C. Due to higher density coating obtained by dual-atmospheres sintering process, the exposed cell showed performance similar to non-poisoned cell (0.95-0.98 W/cm(2)).
Titulo: Effect of interconnect coating procedure on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The cell exposed to air-atmosphere sintered coating interconnect showed lower output power (0.75 W/cm(2)) due to coating lower density.
Titulo: Effect of interconnect coating procedure on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The cell exposed to uncoated interconnect exhibited considerable degradation and the lowest power (0.66 W/cm(2)).
Titulo: Effect of interconnect coating procedure on solid oxide fuel cell performance
